page.title: 12SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: I go to Connaugh County Junior School. It used to be a boys senior school. It is 100 years old. We have 15 classes, a secretary, a welfare assistant, and a partial hearing unit. We have a swimming pool but it was smashed by vandals. We have a big gymnasium and we are one of the few schools to have one. We have a music room ,a hall with a stage, and a small library. Also we have a TV room with a video, a TV and 4 computers. We have 5 Maths sets. We use the calculators and books. Mr. Rota is the caretaker. There is a cycling course. There are dinner ladies who look after children . We have a cafeteria where cooks serve the dinners. We have a large field with a jumping pit and a running track.We have netball and football rallies on Sports Day.
